entities.description: A committee member is mentioned as asking for the location of the beast.

entities.name: hagrid

entities.description: The executioner is mentioned as being furious about the location of the beast.

relationships.description: The committee member asks the executioner about the location of the beast.
Dumbledore responds to the committee member's question.
Hagrid swings an axe into a fence in anger.
The committee member is searching for the beast.
The executioner is angry about the location of the beast.
